org.wildfly.security.password.spec

Class ScramDigestPasswordSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.password.spec.ScramDigestPasswordSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeySpec, AlgorithmPasswordSpec, PasswordSpec

    public final class ScramDigestPasswordSpec
extends Object
implements AlgorithmPasswordSpec
    A PasswordSpec for a SCRAM digest password.
    Author:
    Stefan Guilhen

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScramDigestPasswordSpec

        public ScramDigestPasswordSpec(String algorithm,
                               byte[] digest,
                               byte[] salt,
                               int iterationCount)
        Create a new instance of ScramDigestPasswordSpec with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - to be used to create the digest (SCRAM-SHA-1 or SCRAM-SHA-256).
        digest - a byte[] representing the digest.
        salt - a byte[] representing the salt used to create the digest.
        iterationCount - an int representing the iteration count used to create the digest.
